update t_insurance_his
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_ID = #{signId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INS_TYPE = #{insType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

THIRD_AMOUNT = #{thirdAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
IS_THEFT = #{isTheft,jdbcType=BIT},

IS_AVOID = #{isAvoid,jdbcType=BIT},
AVOID_AMOUNT = #{avoidAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
select a.*, b.NAME as insuranceCompanyName, c.DICT_DATA_NAME as insTypeDesc from t_insurance_his a left join T_INSURANCE_COMPANY b on a.INS_COMPANY_ID = b.id left join SYS_DICT_DATA c on a.INS_TYPE = c.DICT_DATA_CODE where SIGN_ID = #{signId}
and INS_TYPE = #{type}
